lead_paragraph: The anti-doping program at the 2016 Rio Olympics included "some impressive advances" but was also marred by "a number of serious failings", according to a report released on Thursday by the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA).

headline.print_headline: 'Serious Failings' in Rio Anti-Doping Program: WADA
headline.main: 'Serious Failings' in Rio Anti-Doping Program: WADA
